Trade/Device Name(s): Dexcom G7 Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dexcom G7 CGM System (Glucose Sensing Subsystem, Mobile Application Subsystem, Receiver Subsystem)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dexcom G7 Continuous Glucose Monitoring System for real-time glucose measurement and management in diabetics aged 2 years and older.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for real-time, continuous glucose monitoring to aid diabetes management in individuals 2 years and older, replacing fingerstick blood glucose testing for treatment decisions, including detection of hyper- and hypoglycemia and communication with automated insulin dosing systems.
